transcript: you cannot both hate someone and understand them at the same time if I am very angry with someone it's become a check for me where I'm like oh I must not understand something like there's something about them or something about their experience that has made me not understand why they do what they do most people if you were born with the same genetics and live the same life as that person you would see the world the same way as they do what if our Viewpoint of the world is something that someone else hates entirely in their mind we are wrong hard to even really get into that and like empathize with someone else's point of view to that degree but me going through that process has actually been one that I've repeated did multiple times in my life when I was extremely angry with someone
